sentences.english: And the quality yet inexpensive consumer goods from China have been warmly received by the local people here.

sentences.english: The good thing for Heat fans is that Pittman, Butler and Varnado are solid second-round picks.

sentences.english: You can often find great bargains in Los Angeles's garment district.

sentences.english: I have a lot of carpet floor mats for sale, cheap, welcome to buy.

sentences.english: On display was merchandise attractive in price and quality.

sentences.english: These good shoes are a real bargain at such a low price.

sentences.english: Thiazide diuretics are an especially affordable and often effective option.

sentences.english: He has opened a store selling cold meet. Because the food is cheap and good, the business is prosperous.

sentences.english: This white jade pendant is a good buy.
